replies.body: Lobby01 for UHC?
replies.body_tagged: Lobby01 for UHC?

replies.body:
Here's basically what happened as of 8:30 PM PST
  • First off, many players tried to band together and create a base. This was disbanded after a bit as rogue players went in and killed them all.
  • Many players killed at spawn without mercy
  • Admins soon went power hungry, throwing splash potions down on players and causing havoc
  • Admins left after a while, players stopped killing briefly and began to branch out to other areas. Creating skybases, farms and essentially ending the revolution and beginning the glitch world's Renaissance. 
  • At this point, me and PieZ tried to form a communist government, didn't work.
  • Players that had supplies left over from admins (God apples, TNT, diamonds etc) began the slaughter again
  • One man, Random_Guy, opened a fighting pit simply titled "The Pit". Very sketchy. Stay away at all costs
  • Server begins to die down, some leave

  • Admins left after a while, players stopped killing briefly and began to branch out to other areas. Creating skybases, farms and essentially ending the revolution and beginning the glitch world's Renaissance.

  • Players that had supplies left over from admins (God apples, TNT, diamonds etc) began the slaughter again

  • Server begins to die down, some leave

replies.body: The Admins wouldn't have done it if they knew it would have affected the system. They gave away some gears to keep the users occupied until Kylo handles the issue. After a while we discovered that Lobby 1 (I think) was working perfectly, which raised a red flag telling them to stop giving out items.
replies.body_tagged: The Admins wouldn't have done it if they knew it would have affected the system. They gave away some gears to keep the users occupied until Kylo handles the issue. After a while we discovered that Lobby 1 (I think) was working perfectly, which raised a red flag telling them to stop giving out items.
